name: Glowtown
description:
WARNING! The lightning effects might make you feel sick, there is a setting to turn them off in Options

- SPOOK AND SCARE!!! -

Your objective is to find and scare every citizen before the ghost hunters catch you, and beware, 'cause they're moving fast!

- THE HUNTERS -

They get alerted after you scare a certain number of citizens, the more you scare the more they pull you in, so you need to be quick!

- THE LIGHTNING - 

It's not a calm night, there is thunder. And since it's Halloween, it can give some wacky effects! 

- YOUR ACHIEVEMENTS -

Try to collect all of the achievements we created for you, because it's fun when you achieve something. (Just a hint: try to aim for a 100% run ;) )*

*to collect achievements you will need to create and log in into a GameJolt account.

We hope you'll enjoy the game!

The Projects & Snow Team

P.S. Also you can join our Discord Server
